pages.text: $(li)You feel an extrange energy when you hold $(l)The Wither Soul$() in your hand.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:perks/the_guardians_guide)The Guardian's Guide$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)It only can be dropped by $(l:patchouli:bosses/wither)The Wither$(/l) on death.
